Pričakujeta že drugega otroka
Richard Gere in Alejandra naj bi spomladi spet zibala. Igralčevo ženo je med prvo nosečnostjo blagoslovil dalajlama.
07 Nov 2019, 16:00 by T. P.

Pred devetimi meseci je hollywoodski zvezdnik Richard Gere na svet pozdravil sinka Alexandra. A čeprav je igralca tedaj do 70. rojstnega dne ločilo le še nekaj mesecev, ga misel na prečute noči, menjavanje umazanih pleničk in tekanje za malčkom v njegovih že precej zrelih letih nikakor ni plašila. »Prav nič me ne skrbi, da sem oče postal pri teh letih,« je dejal, morda pa bo kmalu obrnil ploščo. Kajti eno je skrb za enega malčka, nekaj drugega pa za dva dojenčka. Da, uganili ste, zvezdnik naj bi le devet mesecev po prihodu sinka, ki se mu je rodil iz ljubezni s 33 let mlajšo Alejandro Silva, že spet pričakoval novorojenčka.
70 let je star Richard Gere.


Prvi otrok zvezdniškega parčka je že pred rojstvom dobil blagoslov.instagram

Ko je Richarda in Alejandro pred petimi leti seznanil skupni prijatelj, se je obema, četudi sta bila uradno še zvezana z drugima, zdelo, da sta kot ustvarjena drug za drugega. »Dovolj je bil le en pogled in že sva začutila neizmerno povezavo. Ves večer nisva mogla umakniti pogleda drug z drugega in od tedaj sva skupaj,« je dejala Alejandra, ki pa se je morala najprej dokončno ločiti od Govinda Friedlanda, s katerim ima šestletnega sinka Alfreda. Podobno je moral do konca izpeljati ločitveni postopek tudi Gere, uradno še poročen s Carey Lowell, s katero pa sta se razšla že leto prej, 2013., po skupnih 11 letih, v katerih jima je prišel na svet zvezdnikov prvorojenec Homer. A je bilo čez prejšnja zakona očitno vredno narediti križ, saj zaljubljenca živita svoje sanje.Prav nič me ne skrbi, da sem oče postal pri teh letih.


Richard in Alejandra drug z drugim živita svoje sanje.instagram

»Občutek imam, da živim pravljico in sem najbolj srečna ženska na zemlji. Najina zgodba je kot popolne, sladke in najbolj romantične sanje. Ne mine dan, da mi Richard ne bi povedal, koliko mu pomenim. Je najbolj izjemen, pozoren in ljubeč moški,« o njem zaljubljeno žgoli Alejandra. Tudi igralec se zaveda, da mu je padla sekira v med. »Sem najbolj srečen moški v vesolju. Kako ne bi bil, ko pa sem se poročil z najbolj pametno in ljubečo žensko, ki vselej pomaga ljudem v stiski, poleg tega je izjemna kuharica. Boljše ne bi mogel najti!« Zato jo je aprila 2018 brez zadržkov popeljal pred oltar. Sprva v njeni domači Španiji, nato pa sta ljubezen proslavila še v krogu prijateljev in družine na drugi strani luže, v New Yorku. Komaj se je slavje dobro pomirilo, sta septembra že razkrila, da sta v veselem pričakovanju. Novice nista delila s svetom, dokler Alejandrinega stanja ni blagoslovil dalajlama. »Neskončno poseben trenutek, ko je najin bodoči otročiček dobil dalajlamov blagoslov,« je dejala nosečnica. Februarja letos je povila zdravega fantiča, ki naj bi že kmalu po svojem prvem rojstnem dnevu postal starejši bratec. Zvezdniški par otroka številka dve pričakuje spomladi.

Nine months ago, Hollywood star Richard Gere welcomed son Alexandra to the world. But even though it only took a few months for the player to have his 70th birthday, the thought of spending the night, changing dirty diapers and running after a toddler in his already mature years had no scare. "I don't really care that I became a father at those years," he said, but he may turn the panel around soon. For one is the care of one toddler, and the other the care of two infants. Yes, you guessed it, just nine months after the arrival of his son, born out of love with 33-year-old Alejandro Silva, the star is already expecting a newborn baby again.
70 years old Richard Gere.


The first child of the celebrity couple received a blessing before birth

When Richard and Alejandro were introduced to a mutual friend five years ago, the two, even though they were officially related to each other, seemed to be made for each other. “Just one look was enough, and we already felt an immense connection. We couldn't take our eyes off each other all night, and we've been together ever since, "said Alejandra, who first had to finally divorce Govind Friedland, with whom he has a six-year-old son, Alfred. Similarly, Gere, officially married to Carey Lowell, had to complete the separation process, with whom they had divorced a year earlier, in 2013, after a total of 11 years in which the first-born Homer was born. But it was obviously worth crossing the law before, since lovers are living their dreams. I really don't care that I became a father at that age.

“I feel like I'm living a fairytale and I'm the happiest woman on earth. Our story is like the perfect, sweetest and most romantic dream. It's not a day since Richard tells me how much I mean to him. He is the most extraordinary, attentive and loving man, "Alejandra bellows in love. The player is also aware that his ax has fallen into the honey. “I'm the luckiest man in the universe. How could I not, but when I married the smartest and most loving woman who always helps people in need, she is an extraordinary cook. I couldn't find any better! ”So, in April 2018, he unceremoniously took her to the altar. At first in her home Spain, then they made love in a circle of friends and family across the puddle in New York. Barely a celebration calmed down, they revealed in September that they were looking forward to it. They did not share the news with the world until Alejandra's condition blessed the Dalai Lama. "An infinitely special moment when our future baby boy received the Dalai Lama's blessing," the pregnant woman said. In February this year, she wrapped up a healthy baby boy who is set to become an older sibling shortly after his first birthday. The star couple of baby number two is expecting spring.
